title: Long term effect of global economic depression

content.question: Which of the following was a major long-term effect of the global economic depression of the 1930s?

choices.label: Governments began to take a more active role in their economies.
Global warming was accelerated by increased burning of fossil fuels.
Land-based empires such as the Ottoman Empire became stronger.
Individuals such as Gandhi developed the practice of nonviolence.

content.answer: Governments began to take a more active role in their economies.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
